MUrray Hill 9-2800
■§■ BLUE CROSS
ASSOCIATED HOSPITAL SERVICE of NEW YORK
H BLUE SHIELD UNITED MEDICAL SERVICE
Public Relations Department
80 Lexington Avenue
New York 16, N.Y.
February 7, 1956
Mr. Tracy F. Tyler
Journal of the AERT
228 La Salle Street
Chicago 1, Illinois
Dear Mr. Tylers
So that we can complete our records, we would greatly
appreciate it if you would furnish us with further in¬
formation about your organization, its publication, and
the group or groups toward whom it is primarily directed.
Thank you very much for your cooperation.
Sincerely yours,
Nancy Brumberg
Public Relations Department
Voluntary — Non-Profit — Health Service Plans
